ValidationRule.description: Avoid saving Offers when Opportunity is on Pending Approvals
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c , 'Pending Approval'), $Profile.Name<>'System Administrator', $Profile.Name<>'Global Process Admin Profile', $Profile.Name<>'Integration API Only Profile', $Profile.Name<>'Data Loader Profile' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot update the offer, when the opportunity is pending for approval
